properties.name: Mapazonia - Colombia - Western Caquetá
properties.author: wille
properties.short_desc: Mapazonia is a project to map collaboratively the Amazon region in OpenStreetMap. Our main objective is to improve the map with all rivers geometry and roads.
properties.instructio: Trace all the rivers and roads using satellite imagery. In some rivers, we can improve the geometry, drawing the contour of the river's area. See Waterway wiki page for more instructions on how to map Waterways.

properties.name: Bwaise Tracing
properties.descriptio:
A community mapping exercise on behalf of the Ugandan Red Cross, conducted by a Tulane ICT4D Class. Please do not trace if you are not a student!

The community is bounded by the four main roads shown in OSM. For good measure and context we'll map what
properties.author: Rbanick
properties.short_desc: A community mapping exercise on behalf of the Ugandan Red Cross, conducted by a Tulane ICT4D Class. Please do not trace if you are not a student!
properties.instructio:
Map everything in the community:

1) Streets 2) Buildings 3) Trees 4) Open spaces 5) Etc.
Use the Bing Imagery under the Imagery tab in JOSM, it's high enough resolution to be useful for our purposes.

properties.name: Mapping Xanxerê
properties.descriptio: The town of Xanxerê in the South of Brasil was reached by a storm on 20 April. Let's improve the map of the city, mapping the main buildings and putting the names on the streets.
